lines.text: Hold on... if the <c=#FF6000>Go Wizard</c> got shot while the place was on fire, and it was hot enough to melt those candles...
How come the blood from the gunshot wound's still pooling? Shouldn't it have evaporated or whatever?
Well, uh... he's a little further away, I guess...
Wait, why am I askin' you? You'll just say whatever makes the story work.
Blood doesn't evaporate as quickly as wax melts, yes.
